command: WITHHELD_FOR_SAFETY - mshta variant: execution from Alternate Data Stream (ADS) launched by PowerShell
explanation: Describes launching mshta from PowerShell to execute HTA content stored in an alternate data stream, relying on the signed host to proxy execution.
rationale_steps: Place HTA-like content in an ADS to obscure the payload on disk
PowerShell then starts mshta targeting the ADS path
Execution runs under mshta, potentially bypassing allowlists and simple AV scans
Detect via Sysmon file stream creation (EID 15) and mshta command lines referencing colon-delimited ADS paths
Constrain ADS execution and disable or restrict mshta where operationally feasible
